cause.description:
Look, Captain Planet is the coolest superhero ever.
Ever.
Plus, he was environmentally aware, and he was really good at one liners. Also, there was this one time he fought Hitler.
So bring him back.
1. EARTH!
2. FIRE!
3. WIND!
4. WATER!
5. HEART!
6. GO PLANET!
7. BY YOUR POWERS COMBINED, I AM CAPTAIN PLANET!
cause.name: Bring Back Captain Planet
